title: National Prison Radio now live on your TV

data.leadParagraph: Now live on TV channel XXX

data.paragraph: National Prison Radio (NPR), the radio station made by prisoners, for prisoners is now available live on your TV, on channel XXX.
You can still catch up on previous editions of your favourite shows on the Hub, but if you want to hear the latest edition live, tune to channel XXX.
Youâ€™ll need to retune your television to pick up NPR. If you do not know how to do this, ask one of the mentors on your community.
